title: Kindly MD Delays Earnings Report Filing as Merger Losses Mount; Shares Drop
contentSnippet: Complex post-merger accounting prompts a late filing while losses mount and the shares slip further.

title: Figure Stock Jumps as Druckenmiller Invests $77M, Analysts Raise Price Targets
contentSnippet: Analysts cited Figure’s shift to ‘capital-light’ model and stablecoin launch on the Provenance blockchain.

title: Almost Perpetual? CBOE to Offer 'Continuous' Bitcoin, Ethereum Futures
contentSnippet: The products are expected to debut next month.

title: Global Probe Finds Illicit Crypto Moving in Patterns Across Major Exchanges
contentSnippet: The ICIJ has outlined how criminals blend on-exchange activity with brokers and storefronts that remain difficult for regulators to monitor.

title: Tom Lee Calls for 100x Ethereum 'Supercycle' Like Bitcoin as BitMine Adds More ETH
contentSnippet: Ethereum treasury firm BitMine Immersion Technologies keeps adding to its stash, grabbing another $170 million worth of ETH last week.

title: Trump’s Maldives Hotel Will Be a Tokenized Real Estate Project
contentSnippet: The Trump International Hotel Maldives, developed with Dar Global, will be tokenized to allow investors to buy digital shares in the development.

title: Cboe to Debut Bitcoin, Ether ‘Perpetual-Style’ Crypto Futures on Dec. 15
contentSnippet: The contracts will offer long-term crypto exposure without rollovers, tailored for institutions avoiding offshore risk.

title: Joe Lubin and SharpLink discuss Linea token launch and Ethereum treasury companies
contentSnippet: Consensys founder Joseph Lubin and SharpLink co-CEO Joseph Chalom discuss ETH treasury companies and Ethereum's future growth.

title: The Digital Chamber ramps up state-level influence ahead of midterms with launch of State Network
contentSnippet: Crypto advocacy group The Digital Chamber is expanding its efforts to the state level as midterms approach in 2026.

title: Cboe to launch perpetual-style bitcoin and ether futures on Dec. 15
contentSnippet: Cboe is set to debut bitcoin and ether “continuous” futures on Dec. 15, offering perpetual-style exposure on a U.S.-regulated exchange.

title: White House Reviews Proposed IRS Rule to Tax Americans' Foreign Crypto Accounts
contentSnippet: The Trump administration has advocated for joining CARF, a global tax-reporting agreement that would allow the IRS to better identify Americans’ foreign crypto holdings.

title: Stellar Slips as Key Support Breaks, Signaling Mounting Bearish Momentum
contentSnippet: A sharp volume-driven breakdown below XLM’s ascending trendline and critical support at $0.2527 has shifted the market structure bearish, setting sights on the $0.2500 zone

title: High-Stakes Gambler Liquidated for $168M After Shorting the Bottom of Crypto Plunge
contentSnippet: A high-stakes crypto trader was wiped out on HyperLiquid before immediately piling back into massive leveraged shorts on GMX — echoing past blow-ups from reckless market punters.

title: SEC Chair Atkins enters crucial 12-month crypto and regulatory push post shutdown, says TD Cowen
contentSnippet: The next 12 months will be pivotal for the SEC following the reopening of the government, said an analyst at investment bank TD Cowen.

title: BlackRock's Bitcoin ETF Sheds Record $463M as Crypto Funds See Worst Week Since February
contentSnippet: Digital asset investment products shed $2 billion last week amid monetary-policy uncertainty and accelerating risk-off sentiment.

title: HBAR Breaks Key Support as Bearish Sentiment Overpowers DeFi Momentum
contentSnippet: Technical breakdown accelerated as selling pressure peaked during final hours of trading session.

title: Sharps Technology stock sinks to record low after debut Solana-treasury quarterly filing
contentSnippet: Sharps’ market value has collapsed to a record low, leaving the company trading well below the current implied worth of its Solana treasury.

title: ZEC Bounced over $700! Crypto still in Extreme Fear! Harvard buys $350M Bitcoin!
contentSnippet: Crypto majors were mostly flat over the weekend after Bitcoin briefly dipped below $94,000 before recovering to $95,400. ETH gained 1% to trade near $3,180, BNB remained steady at $930, and SOL rose 2

title: Bitcoin miner HIVE reports ‘record’ revenue as BTC production jumps
contentSnippet: The bitcoin miner said production also rose despite an "increase in network difficulty" to 717 BTC, currently worth about $67.5 million.

title: Strategy Shares Dip Despite $835 Million Bitcoin Purchase—Its Largest in 4 Months
contentSnippet: Strategy’s euro-denominated preferred shares debuted earlier this month.

title: Bitcoin Accumulation Amid Market Weakness? Sharp Rise in 1K BTC Holders Suggests So
contentSnippet: Rising whale activity hints at strategic positioning during bitcoin’s downturn.

title: Internet Computer Slides as Break Below $5.00 Reinforces Bearish Technical Shift
contentSnippet: ICP extended its pullback from November highs after rejecting key resistance levels, with elevated volume underscoring the market’s focus on support near $4.70.

title: Aave Labs to launch high-yield savings app with ‘insurance-backed protection’ for deposits up to $1 million
contentSnippet: The Aave App will support deposits and withdrawals to over 12,000 banks and debit cards as well as unlimited stablecoin transfers.

title: Figment, OpenTrade and Crypto.com Offer 15% Stablecoin Yield Product for Institutions
contentSnippet: The new offering uses SOL staking and futures to deliver returns without price exposure, targeting compliance-minded investors.

title: Bitcoin’s mined supply crosses 95% of 21 million cap with more than a century of issuance left
contentSnippet: Issuance will continue to decline through each Bitcoin halving cycle, with the final fractions expected to be mined around 2140.

title: Morning Minute: The DAT Meltdown Is On
contentSnippet: There's no way to sugarcoat it—the DAT trade has been a terrible one, with leaders down 50-80% from recent peaks. Is it over?

title: Infura launches DIN AVS to bring decentralized RPC and API marketplace to EigenLayer
contentSnippet: The AVS launch enables permissionless participation from node operators, watchers, and restakers, backed by stETH.

title: Binance Founder CZ Addresses 'Delicate Question' of $4.3B Fine Following Trump Pardon
contentSnippet: Changpeng Zhao, who no longer holds an executive role at Binance, said any refund would be invested in America "to show our appreciation."

title: SOL Strategies to provide staking services for VanEck’s Solana ETF
contentSnippet: The staking of ETF holdings will be made through SOL Strategies' Orangefin validator that it acquired last December.

title: Bitcoin’s Weekend Dip to $93K Sparks Volatility, ‘Extreme Fear’: What’s Next?
contentSnippet: Experts forecast volatile consolidation after Bitcoin dropped to $93K Sunday, triggering 'Extreme Fear' and a Death Cross signal.
